captions.text:
Asked me
to be the best man

At his wedding,
I was like, "whoa,

'cause you've always
been there for me."
Like when I was in rehab

And like the time
I couldn't find my car.

He's always been
the dependable one.

Been the screwed-up one.
Right, dad?

"why can't you
be more like your brother?

Harold would never
beat up his landlord."

A little news flash,
pop. Ha.

Remember that time
in puerto rico

When we picked up
those 2, uh...

Well, I guess
they were prostitutes,

I'm a person, too,
pop, goddamn it!

We've all done crazy things
in our life, so...

Ha ha ha.
You're doing good.

It's because I'm the best
guitar player in the world.

No lessons,
thank you very much, <i>pop.</i>

David: They'll be
divorced in a year.

title: The Wedding Singer (1/6) Movie CLIP - A Drunken Toast (1998) HD

comments.text:
Peter Dante. Adam Sandler tends to use a lot of the same people in all his 
movies (probably because it means he gets to work with his friends) so 
you'd probably remember him from some of his other movies like Big Daddy, 
The Waterboy, etc. He was also in Grandma's Boy.
